1.content:
The marine Side,
-in this story you choose your background history, service history, and a skill to use in battle, make your choices carefully each one has a consequence that will affect you and others around you.

The civilian side,
-you are a college boy returning home from a summer vacation with a couple of friends, but on the way you get involved in a car crash that renders you unconscious, once you wake up your in a gigantic forest forest with oversized animals and your friends are missing, acting on instinct must rescue them, but questions begin to boil up in your head, was the crash accidental or on purpose? Why are these Wolves helping you?
Can you make the right choices and find your friends before something else does?

Which one will you go for?
1.title: The Marine or the civilian

11.content:
choose your background history.

1: the orphan.
Raised on the streets you spent every day trying to fight for survival not knowing what the next day will bring, then at the age of 18 you joined the USMC

2: the army boy.
You were born in the military your parents were USMC operatives, every day was spent on training you to become a USMC officer, by the time you turned 18 you join the Marines just like your mom and dad did.

3: the Navy.
You were born on the USS Remedy your entire life was spent at sea with your mom and dad, your fascination with navy vessels and knowledge about them turned to be quite the advantage when you moved to Canada and join the Canadian Navy at the age of 18.
11.title: Background history

111.content:
Choose your service history record.

1: the Lone survivor.
During an attack on an outpost in East Africa your entire squad including all your commanding officers were Killed in action only you survived.

2: The War Hero.
At the risk of your own life you saved your entire squad from a deadly counterattack in Russia.

3: The Planner.
During an attack in South Korea you devised a military plan to hold back the RoNK forces (Republic of North Korea) the plan went off successfully with no losses on your side.
111.title: Service history

1111.content:
Choose one of three skills to have, every skill has its own advantage and disadvantage.

1: The Gunsmith.
Guns will not jam or overheat when you use them and you also get 30% more ammo in every clip, enter bullet mode to slow the flow of time for a few moments to make more decisions on the battlefield, but you can't repair vehicles, and you're running skill is reduced by 10%.

2: The Negotiator.
Using words instead of violence, you get a 15% discount at the military store, and your persuasion skill is 50% more effective than it would usually be, but your gun will jam or overheat during battle and will take 15% more time to fix them.

3: The Engineer.
Hijacking, and repairing vehicles takes 25% less time then it would usually take, and you can run for 25% longer without getting tired, use the modification skill to modify auto Tourette's, cameras, and Weapons and use them to your advantage, however you will have to pay 15% more money at the military store.
1111.title: Skills

info.brief_description: The story continues with you, Who are you? Why are you here?
info.description:
The story continues.

Unlike the first one created by (Aira the Fox) "The Wolf Pack"
The Wolf Pack 2 has two stories involved.
The Marine side is an interactive RPG adventure and is set six months after the events of the first story.
The civilian side is just an interactive story and is the lead-up to the Marine side which is set one month later.

Before I begin let me explain the rules

1: Unlike the first story other human or nonhuman characters are allowed so be creative
2: there are two Sides to choose from
3: The story depends on you, each choice you make has a consequence
4: some of the rules from the first story are back such as,
-no anal/cock vore (I will delete/edit a chapter if it does)
-The main character may become a wolf (this is optional)
-wolves may talk (this is optional)
-chapters maybe long or short
5: use proper grammar or spelling (Little spelling mistakes are okay I can going in and fix them)
6: no gay or lesbian stuff
7: have your own wild twist's in the story, like betrayal.
